brief: A class representing a nonholonomic drivetrain using position tracking and PID motion control.
name: tao::Drivetrain

publicFunctions.brief: Constructs a new [Drivetrain](classtao_1_1_drivetrain.md) object using two motor groups and an IMU.
publicFunctions.name: Drivetrain

paramList.name: left_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the left side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: right_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the right side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: IMU
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::inertial object for tracking the drivetrain's orientation through a gyro.

paramList.name: profile
paramList.text: A [tao::DrivetrainProfile](structtao_1_1_drivetrain_profile.md) structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

publicFunctions.summary: Constructs a new Drivetrain object using two motor groups and an IMU.
publicFunctions.title: Drivetrain

publicFunctions.brief: Constructs a new [Drivetrain](classtao_1_1_drivetrain.md) object using two motor groups.
publicFunctions.name: Drivetrain

paramList.name: left_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the left side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: right_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the right side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: profile
paramList.text: A [tao::DrivetrainProfile](structtao_1_1_drivetrain_profile.md) structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

publicFunctions.summary: Constructs a new Drivetrain object using two motor groups.
publicFunctions.title: Drivetrain

publicFunctions.argsString: (vex::motor_group &left_motors, vex::motor_group &right_motors, vex::encoder &left_encoder, vex::encoder &right_encoder, vex::inertial &IMU, DrivetrainProfile profile)
publicFunctions.brief: Constructs a new [Drivetrain](classtao_1_1_drivetrain.md) object using two motor groups, an IMU, and two tracking encoders.
publicFunctions.name: Drivetrain

paramList.name: left_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the left side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: right_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the right side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: left_encoder
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::encoder object representing the left tracking encoder.

paramList.name: right_encoder
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::encoder object representing the right tracking encoder.

paramList.name: IMU
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::inertial object for tracking the drivetrain's orientation through a gyro.

paramList.name: profile
paramList.text: A [tao::DrivetrainProfile](structtao_1_1_drivetrain_profile.md) structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

publicFunctions.summary: Constructs a new Drivetrain object using two motor groups, an IMU, and two tracking encoders.
publicFunctions.title: Drivetrain

publicFunctions.brief: Constructs a new [Drivetrain](classtao_1_1_drivetrain.md) object using two motor groups and two tracking encoders.
publicFunctions.name: Drivetrain

paramList.name: left_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the left side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: right_motors
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::motor_group object representing the right side of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: left_encoder
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::encoder object representing the left tracking encoder.

paramList.name: right_encoder
paramList.text: A reference to a vex::encoder object representing the right tracking encoder.

paramList.name: profile
paramList.text: A [tao::DrivetrainProfile](structtao_1_1_drivetrain_profile.md) structure describing values related to the drivetrain for tuning.

publicFunctions.summary: Constructs a new Drivetrain object using two motor groups and two tracking encoders.
publicFunctions.title: Drivetrain

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current global position of the drivetrain as a [Vector2]() object.
publicFunctions.name: get_position
returns: The current global position of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current global position of the drivetrain as a Vector2 object.
publicFunctions.title: get_position

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current counter-clockwise heading of the drivetrain in degrees.
publicFunctions.name: get_heading
note: If the IMU is not configured or installed, the heading will be calculated based on encoders only, using the drivetrain's track width measurements.
returns: The current heading of the drivetrain in degrees.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current counter-clockwise heading of the drivetrain in degrees.
publicFunctions.title: get_heading

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the average linear distance from the starting position traveled by each wheel.
publicFunctions.name: get_drive_distance
returns: The average linear distance from the starting position traveled by each wheel.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the average linear distance from the starting position traveled by each wheel.
publicFunctions.title: get_drive_distance

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current gain constants of the drive PID controller.
publicFunctions.name: get_drive_gains
returns: The current gains as a [PIDGains](structtao_1_1_p_i_d_gains.md) struct.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current gain constants of the drive PID controller.
publicFunctions.title: get_drive_gains

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current gains of the turn PID controller.
publicFunctions.name: get_turn_gains
returns: The current gains as a [PIDGains](structtao_1_1_p_i_d_gains.md) struct.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current gains of the turn PID controller.
publicFunctions.title: get_turn_gains

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current error of the drive PID controller.
publicFunctions.name: get_drive_error
returns: The current drive error (distance between the desired position and the current position).
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current error of the drive PID controller.
publicFunctions.title: get_drive_error

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current error of the turn PID controller.
publicFunctions.name: get_turn_error
returns: The current turn error (distance in degrees between the desired position and the current position).
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current error of the turn PID controller.
publicFunctions.title: get_turn_error

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the minimum acceptable error threshold for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.name: get_drive_tolerance
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the minimum acceptable error threshold for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.title: get_drive_tolerance

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the minimum acceptable error threshold in degrees for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.name: get_turn_tolerance
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the minimum acceptable error threshold in degrees for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.title: get_turn_tolerance

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the lookahead distance used by the drivetrain's pure pursuit controller.
publicFunctions.name: get_lookahead_distance
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the lookahead distance used by the drivetrain's pure pursuit controller.
publicFunctions.title: get_lookahead_distance

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the track width of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.name: get_track_width
returns: The distance between the left and right drivetrain wheels.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the track width of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.title: get_track_width

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current external gear ratio of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.name: get_external_gear_ratio
returns: The current external gear ratio as a quotient.
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current external gear ratio of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.title: get_external_gear_ratio

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current maximum velocity cap for forwards/backwards driving.
publicFunctions.name: get_max_drive_velocity
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current maximum velocity cap for forwards/backwards driving.
publicFunctions.title: get_max_drive_velocity

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current maximum velocity cap for turning.
publicFunctions.name: get_max_turn_velocity
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current maximum velocity cap for turning.
publicFunctions.title: get_max_turn_velocity

publicFunctions.brief: Generates a [tao::DrivetrainProfile]() structure from the current drivetrain state.
publicFunctions.name: get_profile
publicFunctions.summary: Generates a tao::DrivetrainProfile structure from the current drivetrain state.
publicFunctions.title: get_profile

publicFunctions.brief: Indicates if the drivetrain is currently settled (within the threshold of both minimum error ranges).
publicFunctions.name: is_settled
returns: True if the drivetrain is settled, false otherwise.
publicFunctions.summary: Indicates if the drivetrain is currently settled (within the threshold of both minimum error ranges).
publicFunctions.title: is_settled

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the minimum acceptable error threshold for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.name: set_drive_tolerance

paramList.name: error
paramList.text: The new minimum error threhold.

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the minimum acceptable error threshold for the drive PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.title: set_drive_tolerance

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the minimum acceptable error threshold in degrees for the turn PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.name: set_turn_tolerance

paramList.name: error
paramList.text: The new minimum error threhold in degrees.

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the minimum acceptable error threshold in degrees for the turn PID controller to consider its movements settled.
publicFunctions.title: set_turn_tolerance

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the lookahead distance used by the drivetrain's pure pursuit controller.
publicFunctions.name: set_lookahead_distance

paramList.name: distance
paramList.text: The new lookahead radius

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the lookahead distance used by the drivetrain's pure pursuit controller.
publicFunctions.title: set_lookahead_distance

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the gain constants for the drive PID controller.
publicFunctions.name: set_drive_gains

paramList.name: gains
paramList.text: A [PIDGains](structtao_1_1_p_i_d_gains.md) structure containing the new proportional, integral and derivative gain constants.

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the gain constants for the drive PID controller.
publicFunctions.title: set_drive_gains

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the gain constants for the turn PID controller.
publicFunctions.name: set_turn_gains

paramList.name: gains
paramList.text: A [PIDGains](structtao_1_1_p_i_d_gains.md) structure containing the new proportional, integral and derivative gain constants.

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the gain constants for the turn PID controller.
publicFunctions.title: set_turn_gains

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current gear external ratio of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.name: set_external_gear_ratio
note: This could be useful for robots with a variable gear ratio (PTO) system.

paramList.name: ratio
paramList.text: The new external gear ratio as a quotient.

publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current gear external ratio of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.title: set_external_gear_ratio

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the maximum velocity cap for forwards/backwards driving.
publicFunctions.name: set_max_drive_velocity

paramList.name: velocity
paramList.text: A percentage of the new maximum velocity cap.

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the maximum velocity cap for forwards/backwards driving.
publicFunctions.title: set_max_drive_velocity

publicFunctions.brief: Sets the maximum velocity cap for turning.
publicFunctions.name: set_max_turn_velocity

paramList.name: velocity
paramList.text: A percentage of the new maximum velocity cap.

publicFunctions.summary: Sets the maximum velocity cap for turning.
publicFunctions.title: set_max_turn_velocity

publicFunctions.brief: Starts the tracking and PID threads for autonomous movement.
publicFunctions.name: setup_tracking

paramList.name: start_position
paramList.text: A 2D vector representing the starting cartesian coordinates of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: start_heading
paramList.text: An angle in degrees representing the starting orientation of the drivetrain.

publicFunctions.summary: Starts the tracking and PID threads for autonomous movement.
publicFunctions.title: setup_tracking

publicFunctions.brief: Resets the drive encoders and sets a new starting position for the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.name: reset_tracking

paramList.name: start_position
paramList.text: A 2D vector representing the starting cartesian coordinates of the drivetrain.

paramList.name: start_heading
paramList.text: An angle in degrees representing the starting orientation of the drivetrain.

publicFunctions.summary: Resets the drive encoders and sets a new starting position for the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.title: reset_tracking

publicFunctions.brief: Stops all threads used for tracking and movement, restoring manual control of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.name: stop_tracking
publicFunctions.summary: Stops all threads used for tracking and movement, restoring manual control of the drivetrain.
publicFunctions.title: stop_tracking

publicFunctions.brief: Moves the drivetrain directly forwards or backwards along the x-axis.
publicFunctions.name: drive

paramList.name: distance
paramList.text: The distance that the drivetrain will move relative to it's current position.

paramList.name: blocking
paramList.text: Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within drive_tolerance for 10 iterations).

publicFunctions.summary: Moves the drivetrain directly forwards or backwards along the x-axis.
publicFunctions.title: drive

publicFunctions.brief: Turns the drivetrain to an absolute heading.
publicFunctions.name: turn_to

paramList.name: heading
paramList.text: The angle in degrees to rotate the drivetrain to.

paramList.name: blocking
paramList.text: Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within turn_tolerance for 10 iterations).

publicFunctions.summary: Turns the drivetrain to an absolute heading.
publicFunctions.title: turn_to

publicFunctions.brief: Turns the drivetrain face towards the direction of a cartesian coordinate.
publicFunctions.name: turn_to

paramList.name: point
paramList.text: A 2D vector representing the desired coordinates to face towards.

paramList.name: blocking
paramList.text: Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within turn_tolerance for 10 iterations).

publicFunctions.summary: Turns the drivetrain face towards the direction of a cartesian coordinate.
publicFunctions.title: turn_to

publicFunctions.brief: Moves the drivetrain to a set of target coordinates.
publicFunctions.name: move_to

paramList.name: position
paramList.text: A 2D vector representing the absolute target coordinates to move to.

paramList.name: direction
paramList.text: Determines the direction that the robot will face to move to the target. The auto direction will always take the most efficient turn.

paramList.name: blocking
paramList.text: Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within drive tolerance for 10 iterations).

publicFunctions.summary: Moves the drivetrain to a set of target coordinates.
publicFunctions.title: move_to

publicFunctions.brief: Moves the drivetrain along a set of waypoints using pure pursuit.
publicFunctions.name: move_path

paramList.name: path
paramList.text: A vector of 2D vectors representing waypoints forming a path..

publicFunctions.summary: Moves the drivetrain along a set of waypoints using pure pursuit.
publicFunctions.title: move_path

publicFunctions.brief: Stops and holds the drivetrain at its current position and heading.
publicFunctions.name: hold_position

paramList.name: blocking
paramList.text: Determines if the function should block the current thread until settled (within tolerance for 10 iterations).

publicFunctions.summary: Stops and holds the drivetrain at its current position and heading.
publicFunctions.title: hold_position

summary: A class representing a nonholonomic drivetrain using position tracking and PID motion control.
title: tao::Drivetrain
